app.name: ACAR Boilerplate
app.description: A boilerplate for the Accounting and Auditing Regulator application.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

serverError.title: 500 - Server Error
serverError.description: Sorry, there was an error on our end. Please try again later.

unauthorized.title: 401 - Unauthorized
unauthorized.description: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this page.
